00066 static void drawcursor_sima(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar)
00067 {
00068     float zoomx, zoomy, w, h;
00069     int width, height;
00070 
00071     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
00072     ED_space_image_zoom(sima, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
00073 
00074     w = zoomx * width / 256.0f;
00075     h = zoomy * height / 256.0f;
00076     
00077     cpack(0xFFFFFF);
00078     glTranslatef(sima->cursor[0], sima->cursor[1], 0.0);
00079     fdrawline(-0.05f / w, 0, 0, 0.05f / h);
00080     fdrawline(0, 0.05f / h, 0.05f / w, 0.0f);
00081     fdrawline(0.05f / w, 0.0f, 0.0f, -0.05f / h);
00082     fdrawline(0.0f, -0.05f / h, -0.05f / w, 0.0f);
00083 
00084     setlinestyle(4);
00085     cpack(0xFF);
00086     fdrawline(-0.05f / w, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.05f / h);
00087     fdrawline(0.0f, 0.05f / h, 0.05f / w, 0.0f);
00088     fdrawline(0.05f / w, 0.0f, 0.0f, -0.05f / h);
00089     fdrawline(0.0f, -0.05f / h, -0.05f / w, 0.0f);
00090 
00091 
00092     setlinestyle(0.0f);
00093     cpack(0x0);
00094     fdrawline(-0.020f / w, 0.0f, -0.1f / w, 0.0f);
00095     fdrawline(0.1f / w, 0.0f, 0.020f / w, 0.0f);
00096     fdrawline(0.0f, -0.020f / h, 0.0f, -0.1f / h);
00097     fdrawline(0.0f, 0.1f / h, 0.0f, 0.020f / h);
00098 
00099     setlinestyle(1);
00100     cpack(0xFFFFFF);
00101     fdrawline(-0.020f / w, 0.0f, -0.1f / w, 0.0f);
00102     fdrawline(0.1f / w, 0.0f, 0.020f / w, 0.0f);
00103     fdrawline(0.0f, -0.020f / h, 0.0f, -0.1f / h);
00104     fdrawline(0.0f, 0.1f / h, 0.0f, 0.020f / h);
00105 
00106     glTranslatef(-sima->cursor[0], -sima->cursor[1], 0.0);
00107     setlinestyle(0);
00108 }
00109 
00110 static int draw_uvs_face_check(Scene *scene)
00111 {
00112     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00113 
00114     /* checks if we are selecting only faces */
00115     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00116         if (ts->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00117             return 2;
00118         else if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00119             return 1;
00120         else
00121             return 0;
00122     }
00123     else
00124         return (ts->uv_selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE);
00125 }

00127 static void draw_uvs_shadow(Object *obedit)
00128 {
00129     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00130     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00131     BMFace *efa;
00132     BMLoop *l;
00133     BMIter iter, liter;
00134     MLoopUV *luv;
00135 
00136     /* draws the grey mesh when painting */
00137     glColor3ub(112, 112, 112);
00138 
00139     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00140         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00141         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00142             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00143 
00144             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00145         }
00146         glEnd();
00147     }
00148 }
00149 
00150 static int draw_uvs_dm_shadow(DerivedMesh *dm)
00151 {
00152     /* draw shadow mesh - this is the mesh with the modifier applied */
00153 
00154     if (dm && dm->drawUVEdges && CustomData_has_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV)) {
00155         glColor3ub(112, 112, 112);
00156         dm->drawUVEdges(dm);
00157         return 1;
00158     }
00159 
00160     return 0;
00161 }

00163 static void draw_uvs_stretch(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, MTexPoly *activetf)
00164 {
00165     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00166     BMFace *efa;
00167     BMLoop *l;
00168     BMIter iter, liter;
00169     MTexPoly *tf;
00170     MLoopUV *luv;
00171     Image *ima = sima->image;
00172     BLI_array_declare(tf_uv);
00173     BLI_array_declare(tf_uvorig);
00174     float aspx, aspy, col[4], (*tf_uv)[2] = NULL, (*tf_uvorig)[2] = NULL;
00175     int i, j, nverts;
00176 
00177     ED_space_image_uv_aspect(sima, &aspx, &aspy);
00178     
00179     switch (sima->dt_uvstretch) {
00180         case SI_UVDT_STRETCH_AREA:
00181         {
00182             float totarea = 0.0f, totuvarea = 0.0f, areadiff, uvarea, area;
00183             
00184             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00185                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00186                 
00187                 BLI_array_empty(tf_uv);
00188                 BLI_array_empty(tf_uvorig);
00189                 BLI_array_growitems(tf_uv, efa->len);
00190                 BLI_array_growitems(tf_uvorig, efa->len);
00191 
00192                 i = 0;
00193                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00194                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00195 
00196                     copy_v2_v2(tf_uvorig[i], luv->uv);
00197 
00198                     i++;
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 poly_copy_aspect(tf_uvorig, tf_uv, aspx, aspy, efa->len);
00202 
00203                 totarea += BM_face_calc_area(efa);
00204                 //totuvarea += tf_area(tf, efa->v4!=0);
00205                 totuvarea += poly_uv_area(tf_uv, efa->len);
00206                 
00207                 if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
00208                     BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00209                 }
00210                 else {
00211                     if (tf == activetf)
00212                         activetf = NULL;
00213                     BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00214                 }
00215             }
00216             
00217             if (totarea < FLT_EPSILON || totuvarea < FLT_EPSILON) {
00218                 col[0] = 1.0;
00219                 col[1] = col[2] = 0.0;
00220                 glColor3fv(col);
00221                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00222                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
00223                         glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00224                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00225                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00226                             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00227                         }
00228                         glEnd();
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231             }
00232             else {
00233                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00234                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
00235                         area = BM_face_calc_area(efa) / totarea;
00236 
00237                         BLI_array_empty(tf_uv);
00238                         BLI_array_empty(tf_uvorig);
00239                         BLI_array_growitems(tf_uv, efa->len);
00240                         BLI_array_growitems(tf_uvorig, efa->len);
00241 
00242                         i = 0;
00243                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00244                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00245 
00246                             copy_v2_v2(tf_uvorig[i], luv->uv);
00247 
00248                             i++;
00249                         }
00250 
00251                         poly_copy_aspect(tf_uvorig, tf_uv, aspx, aspy, efa->len);
00252 
00253                         //uvarea = tf_area(tf, efa->v4!=0) / totuvarea;
00254                         uvarea = poly_uv_area(tf_uv, efa->len) / totuvarea;
00255                         
00256                         if (area < FLT_EPSILON || uvarea < FLT_EPSILON)
00257                             areadiff = 1.0f;
00258                         else if (area > uvarea)
00259                             areadiff = 1.0f - (uvarea / area);
00260                         else
00261                             areadiff = 1.0f - (area / uvarea);
00262                         
00263                         weight_to_rgb(col, areadiff);
00264                         glColor3fv(col);
00265                         
00266                         glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00267                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00268                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00269                             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00270                         }
00271                         glEnd();
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274             }
00275             break;
00276         }
00277         case SI_UVDT_STRETCH_ANGLE:
00278         {
00279             float *uvang = NULL;
00280             float *ang = NULL;
00281             float (*av)[3] = NULL;  /* use for 2d and 3d  angle vectors */
00282             float (*auv)[2] = NULL;
00283             float a;
00284 
00285             BLI_array_declare(uvang);
00286             BLI_array_declare(ang);
00287             BLI_array_declare(av);
00288             BLI_array_declare(auv);
00289 
00290             col[3] = 0.5; /* hard coded alpha, not that nice */
00291             
00292             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00293             
00294             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00295                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00296                 
00297                 if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
00298                     nverts = efa->len;
00299                     BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00300                     BLI_array_empty(tf_uv);
00301                     BLI_array_empty(tf_uvorig);
00302                     BLI_array_empty(uvang);
00303                     BLI_array_empty(ang);
00304                     BLI_array_empty(av);
00305                     BLI_array_empty(auv);
00306                     BLI_array_growitems(tf_uv, nverts);
00307                     BLI_array_growitems(tf_uvorig, nverts);
00308                     BLI_array_growitems(uvang, nverts);
00309                     BLI_array_growitems(ang, nverts);
00310                     BLI_array_growitems(av, nverts);
00311                     BLI_array_growitems(auv, nverts);
00312 
00313                     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00314                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00315                         copy_v2_v2(tf_uvorig[i], luv->uv);
00316                     }
00317 
00318                     poly_copy_aspect(tf_uvorig, tf_uv, aspx, aspy, nverts);
00319 
00320                     j = nverts - 1;
00321                     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00322                         sub_v2_v2v2(auv[i], tf_uv[j], tf_uv[i]); normalize_v2(auv[i]);
00323                         sub_v3_v3v3(av[i], l->prev->v->co, l->v->co); normalize_v3(av[i]);
00324                         j = i;
00325                     }
00326 
00327                     for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++) {
00328 #if 0
00329                         /* Simple but slow, better reuse normalized vectors
00330                          * (Not ported to bmesh, copied for reference) */
00331                         uvang1 = RAD2DEG(angle_v2v2v2(tf_uv[3], tf_uv[0], tf_uv[1]));
00332                         ang1 = RAD2DEG(angle_v3v3v3(efa->v4->co, efa->v1->co, efa->v2->co));
00333 #endif
00334                         uvang[i] = angle_normalized_v2v2(auv[i], auv[(i + 1) % nverts]);
00335                         ang[i] = angle_normalized_v3v3(av[i], av[(i + 1) % nverts]);
00336                     }
00337 
00338                     glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00339                     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00340                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00341                         a = fabsf(uvang[i] - ang[i]) / (float)M_PI;
00342                         weight_to_rgb(col, 1.0f - powf((1.0f - a), 2.0f));
00343                         glColor3fv(col);
00344                         glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00345                     }
00346                     glEnd();
00347                 }
00348                 else {
00349                     if (tf == activetf)
00350                         activetf = NULL;
00351                     BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00352                 }
00353             }
00354 
00355             glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00356 
00357             BLI_array_free(uvang);
00358             BLI_array_free(ang);
00359             BLI_array_free(av);
00360             BLI_array_free(auv);
00361 
00362             break;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     BLI_array_free(tf_uv);
00367     BLI_array_free(tf_uvorig);
00368 }
00369 
00370 static void draw_uvs_other(Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Image *curimage)
00371 {
00372     Base *base;
00373 
00374     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00375 
00376     for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00377         Object *ob = base->object;
00378 
00379         if (!(base->flag & SELECT)) continue;
00380         if (!(base->lay & scene->lay)) continue;
00381         if (ob->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_VIEW) continue;
00382 
00383         if ((ob->type == OB_MESH) && (ob != obedit)) {
00384             Mesh *me = ob->data;
00385 
00386             if (me->mtpoly) {
00387                 MPoly *mpoly = me->mpoly;
00388                 MTexPoly *mtpoly = me->mtpoly;
00389                 MLoopUV *mloopuv;
00390                 int a, b;
00391 
00392                 for (a = me->totpoly; a > 0; a--, mtpoly++, mpoly++) {
00393                     if (mtpoly->tpage == curimage) {
00394                         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00395 
00396                         mloopuv = me->mloopuv + mpoly->loopstart;
00397                         for (b = 0; b < mpoly->totloop; b++, mloopuv++) {
00398                             glVertex2fv(mloopuv->uv);
00399                         }
00400                         glEnd();
00401                     }
00402                 }
00403             }
00404         }
00405     }
00406 }
00407 
00408 static void draw_uvs_texpaint(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00409 {
00410     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00411     Image *curimage = ED_space_image(sima);
00412 
00413     if (sima->flag & SI_DRAW_OTHER)
00414         draw_uvs_other(scene, ob, curimage);
00415 
00416     glColor3ub(112, 112, 112);
00417 
00418     if (me->mtface) {
00419         MPoly *mpoly = me->mpoly;
00420         MTexPoly *tface = me->mtpoly;
00421         MLoopUV *mloopuv;
00422         int a, b;
00423 
00424         for (a = me->totpoly; a > 0; a--, tface++, mpoly++) {
00425             if (tface->tpage == curimage) {
00426                 glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00427 
00428                 mloopuv = me->mloopuv + mpoly->loopstart;
00429                 for (b = 0; b < mpoly->totloop; b++, mloopuv++) {
00430                     glVertex2fv(mloopuv->uv);
00431                 }
00432                 glEnd();
00433             }
00434         }
00435     }
00436 }
00437 
00438 /* draws uv's in the image space */
00439 static void draw_uvs(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
00440 {
00441     ToolSettings *ts;
00442     Mesh *me = obedit->data;
00443     BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00444     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00445     BMFace *efa, *efa_act, *activef;
00446     BMLoop *l;
00447     BMIter iter, liter;
00448     MTexPoly *tf, *activetf = NULL;
00449     MLoopUV *luv;
00450     DerivedMesh *finaldm, *cagedm;
00451     unsigned char col1[4], col2[4];
00452     float pointsize;
00453     int drawfaces, interpedges;
00454     Image *ima = sima->image;
00455 
00456     StitchPreviewer *stitch_preview = uv_get_stitch_previewer();
00457 
00458     activetf = EDBM_mtexpoly_active_get(em, &efa_act, FALSE); /* will be set to NULL if hidden */
00459     activef = BM_active_face_get(bm, FALSE);
00460     ts = scene->toolsettings;
00461 
00462     drawfaces = draw_uvs_face_check(scene);
00463     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION)
00464         interpedges = (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX);
00465     else
00466         interpedges = (ts->uv_selectmode == UV_SELECT_VERTEX);
00467     
00468     /* draw other uvs */
00469     if (sima->flag & SI_DRAW_OTHER) {
00470         Image *curimage = (activetf) ? activetf->tpage : NULL;
00471 
00472         draw_uvs_other(scene, obedit, curimage);
00473     }
00474 
00475     /* 1. draw shadow mesh */
00476     
00477     if (sima->flag & SI_DRAWSHADOW) {
00478         /* first try existing derivedmesh */
00479         if (!draw_uvs_dm_shadow(em->derivedFinal)) {
00480             /* create one if it does not exist */
00481             cagedm = editbmesh_get_derived_cage_and_final(scene, obedit, me->edit_btmesh, &finaldm, CD_MASK_BAREMESH | CD_MASK_MTFACE);
00482 
00483             /* when sync selection is enabled, all faces are drawn (except for hidden)
00484              * so if cage is the same as the final, theres no point in drawing this */
00485             if (!((ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) && (cagedm == finaldm)))
00486                 draw_uvs_dm_shadow(finaldm);
00487             
00488             /* release derivedmesh again */
00489             if (cagedm != finaldm) cagedm->release(cagedm);
00490             finaldm->release(finaldm);
00491         }
00492     }
00493     
00494     /* 2. draw colored faces */
00495     
00496     if (sima->flag & SI_DRAW_STRETCH) {
00497         draw_uvs_stretch(sima, scene, em, activetf);
00498     }
00499     else if (!(sima->flag & SI_NO_DRAWFACES)) {
00500         /* draw transparent faces */
00501         UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_FACE, col1);
00502         UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_FACE_SELECT, col2);
00503         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00504         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00505         
00506         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00507             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00508             
00509             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
00510                 BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00511                 if (tf == activetf) continue;  /* important the temp boolean is set above */
00512 
00513                 if (uvedit_face_select_test(scene, em, efa))
00514                     glColor4ubv((GLubyte *)col2);
00515                 else
00516                     glColor4ubv((GLubyte *)col1);
00517                 
00518                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00519                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00520                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00521                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00522                 }
00523                 glEnd();
00524             }
00525             else {
00526                 if (tf == activetf)
00527                     activetf = NULL;
00528                 BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00529             }
00530         }
00531         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00532     }
00533     else {
00534         /* would be nice to do this within a draw loop but most below are optional, so it would involve too many checks */
00535         
00536         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00537             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00538 
00539             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {        
00540                 BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00541             }
00542             else {
00543                 if (tf == activetf)
00544                     activetf = NULL;
00545                 BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00546             }
00547         }
00548         
00549     }
00550 
00551     /* 3. draw active face stippled */
00552 
00553     if (activef) {
00554         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, activef->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00555         if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, activef, tf)) {
00556             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00557             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00558             UI_ThemeColor4(TH_EDITMESH_ACTIVE);
00559 
00560             glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00561             glPolygonStipple(stipple_quarttone);
00562 
00563             glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00564             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, activef, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00565                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00566                 glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00567             }
00568             glEnd();
00569 
00570             glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00571             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00572         }
00573     }
00574     
00575     /* 4. draw edges */
00576 
00577     if (sima->flag & SI_SMOOTH_UV) {
00578         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00579         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00580         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00581     }
00582     
00583     switch (sima->dt_uv) {
00584         case SI_UVDT_DASH:
00585             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00586                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00587                     continue;
00588                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00589 
00590                 if (tf) {
00591                     cpack(0x111111);
00592 
00593                     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00594                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00595                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00596                         glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00597                     }
00598                     glEnd();
00599 
00600                     setlinestyle(2);
00601                     cpack(0x909090);
00602 
00603                     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00604                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00605                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00606                         glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00607                     }
00608                     glEnd();
00609 
00610 #if 0
00611                     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00612                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, efa->lbase->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00613                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00614                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, efa->lbase->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00615                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00616                     glEnd();
00617 #endif
00618 
00619                     setlinestyle(0);
00620                 }
00621             }
00622             break;
00623         case SI_UVDT_BLACK: /* black/white */
00624         case SI_UVDT_WHITE: 
00625             if (sima->dt_uv == SI_UVDT_WHITE) glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00626             else glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00627 
00628             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00629                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00630                     continue;
00631 
00632                 glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00633                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00634                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00635                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00636                 }
00637                 glEnd();
00638             }
00639             break;
00640         case SI_UVDT_OUTLINE:
00641             glLineWidth(3);
00642             cpack(0x0);
00643             
00644             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00645                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00646                     continue;
00647 
00648                 glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00649                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00650                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00651                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00652                 }
00653                 glEnd();
00654             }
00655             
00656             glLineWidth(1);
00657             col2[0] = col2[1] = col2[2] = 192; col2[3] = 255;
00658             glColor4ubv((unsigned char *)col2); 
00659             
00660             if (me->drawflag & ME_DRAWEDGES) {
00661                 int sel, lastsel = -1;
00662                 UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_VERTEX_SELECT, col1);
00663 
00664                 if (interpedges) {
00665                     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00666 
00667                     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00668                         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00669                             continue;
00670 
00671                         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00672                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00673                             sel = (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l) ? 1 : 0);
00674                             glColor4ubv(sel ? (GLubyte *)col1 : (GLubyte *)col2);
00675 
00676                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00677                             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00678                         }
00679                         glEnd();
00680                     }
00681 
00682                     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00683                 }
00684                 else {
00685                     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00686                         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00687                             continue;
00688 
00689                         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00690                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00691                             sel = (uvedit_edge_select_test(em, scene, l) ? 1 : 0);
00692                             if (sel != lastsel) {
00693                                 glColor4ubv(sel ? (GLubyte *)col1 : (GLubyte *)col2);
00694                                 lastsel = sel;
00695                             }
00696                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00697                             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00698                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00699                             glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00700                         }
00701                         glEnd();
00702                     }
00703                 }
00704             }
00705             else {
00706                 /* no nice edges */
00707                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00708                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00709                         continue;
00710                 
00711                     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00712                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00713                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00714                         glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00715                     }
00716                     glEnd();
00717                 }
00718             }
00719             
00720             break;
00721     }
00722 
00723     if (sima->flag & SI_SMOOTH_UV) {
00724         glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00725         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00726     }
00727 
00728     /* 5. draw face centers */
00729 
00730     if (drawfaces) {
00731         float cent[2];
00732         
00733         pointsize = UI_GetThemeValuef(TH_FACEDOT_SIZE);
00734         glPointSize(pointsize); // TODO - drawobject.c changes this value after - Investigate!
00735         
00736         /* unselected faces */
00737         UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
00738 
00739         bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00740         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00741             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00742                 continue;
00743 
00744             if (!uvedit_face_select_test(scene, em, efa)) {
00745                 poly_uv_center(em, efa, cent);
00746                 bglVertex2fv(cent);
00747             }
00748         }
00749         bglEnd();
00750 
00751         /* selected faces */
00752         UI_ThemeColor(TH_FACE_DOT);
00753 
00754         bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00755         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00756             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00757                 continue;
00758 
00759             if (uvedit_face_select_test(scene, em, efa)) {
00760                 poly_uv_center(em, efa, cent);
00761                 bglVertex2fv(cent);
00762             }
00763         }
00764         bglEnd();
00765     }
00766 
00767     /* 6. draw uv vertices */
00768     
00769     if (drawfaces != 2) { /* 2 means Mesh Face Mode */
00770         /* unselected uvs */
00771         UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
00772         pointsize = UI_GetThemeValuef(TH_VERTEX_SIZE);
00773         glPointSize(pointsize);
00774     
00775         bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00776         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00777             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00778                 continue;
00779 
00780             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00781                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00782                 if (!uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l))
00783                     bglVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00784             }
00785         }
00786         bglEnd();
00787     
00788         /* pinned uvs */
00789         /* give odd pointsizes odd pin pointsizes */
00790         glPointSize(pointsize * 2 + (((int)pointsize % 2) ? (-1) : 0));
00791         cpack(0xFF);
00792     
00793         bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00794         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00795             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00796                 continue;
00797 
00798             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00799                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00800 
00801                 if (luv->flag & MLOOPUV_PINNED)
00802                     bglVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00803             }
00804         }
00805         bglEnd();
00806     
00807         /* selected uvs */
00808         UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00809         glPointSize(pointsize);
00810     
00811         bglBegin(GL_POINTS);
00812         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00813             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00814                 continue;
00815 
00816             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00817                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00818 
00819                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l))
00820                     bglVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00821             }
00822         }
00823         bglEnd();   
00824     }
00825 
00826     /* finally draw stitch preview */
00827     if (stitch_preview) {
00828         int i, index = 0;
00829         glPushClientAttrib(GL_CLIENT_VERTEX_ARRAY_BIT);
00830         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00831 
00832         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00833 
00834         UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_ACTIVE);
00835         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00836         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, stitch_preview->static_tris);
00837         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, stitch_preview->num_static_tris * 3);
00838 
00839         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, stitch_preview->preview_polys);
00840         for (i = 0; i < stitch_preview->num_polys; i++) {
00841             glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00842             UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_FACE);
00843             glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, index, stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon[i]);
00844             glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_LINE);
00845             UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_EDGE);
00846             glDrawArrays(GL_POLYGON, index, stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon[i]);
00847 
00848             index += stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon[i];
00849         }
00850         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_POINT);
00851 #if 0
00852         UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_VERT);
00853         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, stitch_preview->num_tris * 3);
00854 #endif
00855         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00856 
00857         /* draw vert preview */
00858         glPointSize(pointsize * 2.0);
00859         UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_STITCHABLE);
00860         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, stitch_preview->preview_stitchable);
00861         glDrawArrays(GL_POINTS, 0, stitch_preview->num_stitchable);
00862 
00863         UI_ThemeColor4(TH_STITCH_PREVIEW_UNSTITCHABLE);
00864         glVertexPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, stitch_preview->preview_unstitchable);
00865         glDrawArrays(GL_POINTS, 0, stitch_preview->num_unstitchable);
00866 
00867         glPopClientAttrib();
00868         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00869     }
00870 
00871     glPointSize(1.0);
00872 }
00873 
00874 void draw_uvedit_main(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Object *obact)
00875 {
00876     ToolSettings *toolsettings = scene->toolsettings;
00877     int show_uvedit, show_uvshadow, show_texpaint_uvshadow;
00878 
00879     show_texpaint_uvshadow = (obact && obact->type == OB_MESH && obact->mode == OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT);
00880     show_uvedit = ED_space_image_show_uvedit(sima, obedit);
00881     show_uvshadow = ED_space_image_show_uvshadow(sima, obedit);
00882 
00883     if (show_uvedit || show_uvshadow || show_texpaint_uvshadow) {
00884         if (show_uvshadow)
00885             draw_uvs_shadow(obedit);
00886         else if (show_uvedit)
00887             draw_uvs(sima, scene, obedit);
00888         else
00889             draw_uvs_texpaint(sima, scene, obact);
00890 
00891         if (show_uvedit && !(toolsettings->use_uv_sculpt))
00892             drawcursor_sima(sima, ar);
00893     }
00894 }
